dt-option.name: searchPanes.panes.options.className
dt-option.summary: Define the class to be added to the row for an option of a custom pane

type.description: The `-init searchPanes.panes.className` is the class that will be added to the row for the custom option in the pane.

dt-option.default: The default value of `-init searchPanes.panes.options.className` is undefined.
dt-option.description:
As standard, the value of the `className` is undefined.
Setting `-init searchPanes.panes.options.className` to a string value will set the class of the row for the option in the custom pane. This is particularly useful for adding custom styling to a specific row.
